root: ^Everything you see here is something I’ve made.

WhatBrings: ^Can I ask what brings you here?
Explore: ^That is a little difficult these days I’m afraid.
^The only way to travel around here is by Zeppelin, but those are terribly expensive.
^There is a Gate in the Mountains that is said to lead further on, but it has been locked for as long as I can remember.
^The only way through is with six unique <color=#F8FF30>Keys</color>.
JustTraveling: ^Not many travelers these days, with Sky Pirates terrorizing the Zeppelins.
^The only place they don’t go is beyond The Mountain Gate.
^But the gate’s been locked for longer than I’ve been alive.
^The only way through is with six unique <color=#F8FF30>Keys</color>.
HaveKey: ^I do happen to have one such <color=#F8FF30>Key</color> in my possession, but you would have to do something for me to get it.
^I have been struggling with one of my creations lately.
^If you can help me finish it, consider the <color=#F8FF30>Key</color> yours!
FindKeys: ^They were scattered a long time ago, but I’ve seen a few people around town carrying them.
^I myself got my hands on one a few months ago from a favor.
^If you want it, you’ll have to do me a favor.
^Help me with my newest invention and the <color=#F8FF30>Key</color> will be yours.
